<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

  context={"endpoint"}

</MethodEndpoint>



This is a pre-flight check endpoint that allows clients to validate
an assignment before attempting it. Useful for UI feedback.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
